SA20n1291:3: bhāva utpaddyate nityaṃ bhābo bhrāntiḥ khapuṣpavat ||
SA20n1291:4: 2. sati dharme nabhastulye khatulyaṃ jāyate param |
SA20n1291:6: 3. sbabhāvataḥ karma nāsti heturnāsti falaṃ na ca |
SA20n1291:7: na viddyata idaṃ sarbaṃ loko nāsti na bhañjanam ||
SA20n1291:10: lokaḥ prathamato'jātaḥ kenāpi na hi nirmitaḥ ||
SA20n1291:16: bhūtaṃ hitvā cittacaitte ca nastastasmātkāyaḥ kalpahīnasvabhāvaḥ ||
SA20n1291:17: 7. citta nāsti na dharmāste na kāyo nāpi dhātavaḥ |
SA20n1291:29: kalpanā sāpi śūnyeyaṃ yayā śūnyeti kalpitāḥ ||
SA20n1291:34: 15. na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānnvetti ca |
SA20n1291:35: etattu paraṃ satyaṃ lokasya viṣayo na yat ||
SA20n1291:36: 16. cakṣurnāsti na rūpañca dṛśyaṃ nāsti na manaskriyā |
SA20n1291:37: cittaṃ svapnasamaṃ bhrāntiḥ sarvaṃ na sadasanna ca ||
